text: On 6 May 2021, at least 25 people were killed in a shootout between police and drug traffickers in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. The raid happened in Jacarezinho, a favela in Rio de Janeiro. The police raid happened before noon, following reports that a local drug gang was trying to recruit children. The shootout caused the highest-ever death toll from a police raid in Rio de Janeiro. ==References== Category:2021 in Brazil Category:2021 mass shootings Category:Crime in South America Category:May 2021 events 2021 shootout
title: 2021 Rio de Janeiro shootout
